metadata.name: Shifu Gǔrén's Expression of Zen.
metadata.description:
Inner Smile, Outer Smile | Smiles are contagious. Smile at most people and they smile back. Smile to your cat and I'm sure that your cat is smiling back :'D Smile to the inside of your body and your organs smile. It heals. It settles the spirit. Smile today. Shifu loves you. I love you. ☯

Drawn, Inked and Shaded Traditionally. Colored and Animated Digitally.  
File Type: .gif
